mapper.sql: select gs.id, gs.shipment_no, gs.department_id, gs.shipment_date, gs.warehouse_id, gs.shipment_status, gs.shipment_type, gs.del_flag, gs.audit_date, gs.create_by, gs.create_time, gs.update_by, gs.update_time, gs.remark, w.id wId,w.code warehouseCode,w.name warehouseName, d.id dId,d.code departmentCode,d.name departmentName from gz_shipment gs left join fd_warehouse w on gs.warehouse_id = w.id left join fd_department d on gs.department_id = d.id
mapper.select: select gs.id, gs.shipment_no, gs.department_id, gs.shipment_date, gs.warehouse_id, gs.shipment_status, gs.shipment_type, gs.del_flag, gs.audit_date, gs.create_by, gs.create_time, gs.update_by, gs.update_time, gs.remark, w.id wId,w.code warehouseCode,w.name warehouseName, d.id dId,d.code departmentCode,d.name departmentName, COALESCE(SUM(gse.amt), 0) as totalAmt from gz_shipment gs left join fd_warehouse w on gs.warehouse_id = w.id left join fd_department d on gs.department_id = d.id left join gz_shipment_entry gse on gse.paren_id = gs.id and gse.del_flag != 1 where gs.del_flag != 1 and gs.shipment_no like concat('%', #{shipmentNo}, '%') and gs.department_id = #{departmentId} and gs.shipment_date = #{shipmentDate} and gs.warehouse_id = #{warehouseId} and gs.shipment_status = #{shipmentStatus} and gs.shipment_type = #{shipmentType} and gs.audit_date = #{auditDate} group by gs.id, gs.shipment_no, gs.department_id, gs.shipment_date, gs.warehouse_id, gs.shipment_status, gs.shipment_type, gs.del_flag, gs.audit_date, gs.create_by, gs.create_time, gs.update_by, gs.update_time, gs.remark, w.id, w.code, w.name, d.id, d.code, d.name order by gs.shipment_date desc, gs.id desc

select a.id, a.shipment_no, a.department_id, a.shipment_date, a.warehouse_id, a.shipment_status, a.shipment_type, a.del_flag, a.audit_date, a.create_by, a.create_time, a.update_by, a.update_time, a.remark, b.id as sub_id, b.paren_id as sub_paren_id, b.material_id as sub_material_id, b.qty as sub_qty, b.price as sub_price, b.amt as sub_amt, b.batch_no as sub_batch_no, b.batch_number as sub_batch_number, b.begin_time as sub_begin_time, b.end_time as sub_end_time, b.del_flag as sub_del_flag, b.master_barcode as sub_master_barcode, b.secondary_barcode as sub_secondary_barcode, b.in_hospital_code as sub_in_hospital_code, b.remark as sub_remark from gz_shipment a left join gz_shipment_entry b on b.paren_id = a.id where a.id = #{id}
